title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as 

the Garda Síochána 

(Associations) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) The Garda Síochána (Associations) Regulations 1978 to 2018 and these 
Regulations may be cited together as the Garda Síochána (Associations) 
Regulations 1978 to 2020. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited garda siochana (associations) (amendment) regulation 2020 (2) garda siochana (associations) regulation 1978 2018 regulation may cited together garda siochana (associations) regulation 1978 2020 interpretation

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“2020 Annual Delegate Conference” shall be construed in accordance with 
Regulation 4; 

“Annual Delegate Conference” has the same meaning as it has in the 
Regulations of 1998; 

“President” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations of 1998; 

“Regulations of 1998” means Garda Síochána (Associations) (Amendment) 
Regulations 1998 (S.I. No. 63 of 1998); 

“Trustee” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations of 1998; 

“Vice-President” has the same meaning as it has in the Regulations of 1998. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [605] 3 

(2) A reference in these Regulations to a person who has been elected to an 
office shall include a reference to a person who has been deemed elected to the 
office. 

Provision for electronic communications technology
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation - 2020 annual delegate conference shall construed accordance regulation 4 annual delegate conference meaning regulation 1998 president meaning regulation 1998 regulation 1998 mean garda siochana (associations) (amendment) regulation 1998 (s.i no 63 1998) trustee meaning regulation 1998 vice-president meaning regulation 1998 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 18th december 2020 605 3 (2) reference regulation person elected office shall include reference person deemed elected office provision electronic communication technology

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 3. (1) The 2020 Annual Delegate Conference need not be held at a physical
text_raw:
3. (1) The 2020 Annual Delegate Conference need not be held at a physical 
venue but may be conducted wholly or partly by the use of electronic 
communications technology so long as all attendees have a reasonable 
opportunity to participate in the conference in accordance with this Regulation. 

(2) 

(a) Provision may be made in standing orders or otherwise for 
participation in the 2020 Annual Delegate Conference by the use 
of electronic communications technology, including for a 
mechanism for casting votes by an attendee, whether before or 
during the conference. 

(b) The mechanism referred to in paragraph (a) shall not require the 
attendee to be physically present at the 2020 Annual Delegate 
Conference or require the attendee to appoint a proxy who is to 
be physically present at the conference. 

(3) Any temporary failure or disruption of electronic communications 
technology shall not invalidate the conference merely by virtue of that 
temporary failure or disruption. 

(4) In this Regulation- 

“attendee”, in relation to the 2020 Annual Delegate Conference, means a 
delegate to the conference or any other person attending the conference; 

“electronic communications technology”, in relation to the 2020 Annual 
Delegate Conference, means technology that enables real-time transmission 
and real-time 
two-way audio or audio-visual communication enabling 
attendees to participate in the conference using such technology from a remote 
location. 

Annual Delegate Conference for year 2020
text_norm: 3 (1) 2020 annual delegate conference need held physical venue may conducted wholly partly use electronic communication technology long attendee reasonable opportunity participate conference accordance regulation (2) (a) provision may made standing order otherwise participation 2020 annual delegate conference use electronic communication technology including mechanism casting vote attendee whether conference (b) mechanism referred paragraph (a) shall require attendee physically present 2020 annual delegate conference require attendee appoint proxy physically present conference (3) temporary failure disruption electronic communication technology shall invalidate conference merely virtue temporary failure disruption (4) regulation- attendee relation 2020 annual delegate conference mean delegate conference person attending conference electronic communication technology relation 2020 annual delegate conference mean technology enables real-time transmission real-time two-way audio audio-visual communication enabling attendee participate conference using technology remote location annual delegate conference year 2020

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 4. Notwithstanding Regulation 12(4) of the Regulations of 1998, the
text_raw:
4. Notwithstanding Regulation 12(4) of the Regulations of 1998, the 
Annual Delegate Conference in the year 2020 (in these Regulations referred to 
as the “2020 Annual Delegate Conference”) may be held at any time on or after 
9 December 2020 and prior to 1 January 2021. 

Standing Orders Committee
text_norm: 4 notwithstanding regulation 12(4) regulation 1998 annual delegate conference year 2020 (in regulation referred 2020 annual delegate conference ) may held time 9 december 2020 prior 1 january 2021 standing order committee

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 5. Notwithstanding Regulation 13(1) of the Regulations of 1998, the
text_raw:
5. Notwithstanding Regulation 13(1) of the Regulations of 1998, the 
election of the Standing Orders Committee referred to in that Regulation by the 
2020 Annual Delegate Conference may be done by secret ballot carried out 
using electronic communications technology. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [605] 

President
text_norm: 5 notwithstanding regulation 13(1) regulation 1998 election standing order committee referred regulation 2020 annual delegate conference may done secret ballot carried using electronic communication technology 4 605 president

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 6. Notwithstanding Regulation 14(1) of the Regulations of 1998 –
text_raw:
6. Notwithstanding Regulation 14(1) of the Regulations of 1998 – 

(a) 

(b) 

the President elected by the Annual Delegate Conference held in 
2018 shall hold the office until the close of the 2020 Annual 
Delegate Conference, 

the President elected by the 2020 Annual Delegate Conference 
shall hold the office until the close of the Annual Delegate 
Conference held in 2022. 

Vice-President
text_norm: 6 notwithstanding regulation 14(1) regulation 1998 - (a) (b) president elected annual delegate conference held 2018 shall hold office close 2020 annual delegate conference president elected 2020 annual delegate conference shall hold office close annual delegate conference held 2022 vice-president

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 7. Notwithstanding Regulation 15(1) of the Regulations of 1998 –
text_raw:
7. Notwithstanding Regulation 15(1) of the Regulations of 1998 – 

(a) 

(b) 

the Vice-President elected by the Annual Delegate Conference 
held in 2018 shall hold the office until the close of the 2020 
Annual Delegate Conference, and 

the Vice-President elected by the 2020 Annual Delegate 
Conference shall hold the office until the close of the Annual 
Delegate Conference held in 2022. 

Trustees
text_norm: 7 notwithstanding regulation 15(1) regulation 1998 - (a) (b) vice-president elected annual delegate conference held 2018 shall hold office close 2020 annual delegate conference vice-president elected 2020 annual delegate conference shall hold office close annual delegate conference held 2022 trustee

title: 2015 (No. 49 of 2015)) and 128 (2) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of
heading: 8. Notwithstanding Regulation 21(2) of the Regulations of 1998 –
text_raw:
8. Notwithstanding Regulation 21(2) of the Regulations of 1998 – 

(a) 

(b) 

the Trustee elected by the Annual Delegate Conference held in 
2015 shall hold office until the close of the 2020 Annual 
Delegate Conference, 

the Trustee elected by the 2020 Annual Delegate Conference in 
accordance with Regulation 21(2) of the Regulations of 1998 
shall hold office until the close of the Annual Delegate 
Conference held in 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

[605] 5 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

8 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice.
